definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: And its also used as a freezproof agent and anti-freezing agent.
sentences.chinese: 作爲防凍劑和融雪劑廣泛用於融雪化冰。

sentences.english: But small amount anti-freeze was added to it. And that seem to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 但是加入了一些防凍劑，這貌似可以解決這個問題了。

sentences.english: Shall I put some anti- freeze in the radiator?
sentences.chinese: 要不要在散熱器裏注入一些防凍劑？

sentences.english: Later the 3 common antifreezing agents were studied.
sentences.chinese: 再對3種常用防凍劑進行了篩選。

sentences.english: The suitable percent of the sodium nitrite as antifreezing agent was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得到了亞硝酸鹽鈉作爲防凍劑的最佳摻量。

sentences.english: DEG is used in antifreeze and as a solvent.
sentences.chinese: 二甘醇用於防凍劑或作爲一種溶劑使用。
